main event: Multiple UFO sightings reported in Illinois on September 7, 1955 and September 13, 1952.
interesting points: The first report describes a large relic-like object with a grey side and a rapidly accelerating black taillight.
The second report details a steady level flight of an unidentified object at approximately 3000 ft altitude, observed for 15 minutes before disappearing.
In the second sighting, the object appeared to rotate once in flight and was described as unusually ice blue with no other similar objects present in the sky.
Both reports highlight the inaction of civilian enforcement officials and military refusal to investigate the sightings, causing delays in reporting.
The UFO in the second sighting was estimated to be under 120 ft in size and was observed just after a flight in landing pattern.
